S03n251:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānekadoṣavyasanopasṛṣṭamarthakāmapradhānatvādanaupaśamikaṃ rāgadveṣamohāmarṣasaṃrambhamadamānamātsaryādidoṣarajasāmāpātaṃ pātanaṃ hrīdharmaparigrahasyāyatana lobhāsadgrāhasya kukāryasaṃbādhatvātkṛśavakāśaṃ dharmasyāvetya gṛhavāsaṃ parigrahaviṣayaparivarjanācca taddoṣavivekasukhāṃ pravrajyāmanupaśyan śīlaśrutapraśamavinayaniyamānasastāpaso babhūva |
S03n251:4: tamaskhalitasamādānaṃ kṣāntivarṇavādinaṃ tadanurūpadharmākhyānakramaṃ vyatītya sve nāmagotre kṣāntivādinamityeva lokaḥ svabuddhipūrvakaṃ saṃjajñe |
S03n251:8: cakāra yatkṣāntikathāḥ prasaktaṃ tatkṣāntivādīti tato vijajñe ||2 ||
S03n251:10: tadarthayuktāśca kathāviśeṣāḥ kīrtyā muniṃ taṃ prathayāṃbabhūvuḥ ||3 ||
S03n251:14: sa tatra bahumanyamānastadadhyuṣitairdevatāviśeṣairabhigamyamānaśca śreyobhilāṣiṇāguṇavatsalena janena kṣāntipratisaṃyuktābhiḥ śrutihṛdayalhādinībhirdharmyābhiḥ kathābhisatasya janakāyasya paramanugrahaṃ cakāra |
S03n251:15: atha kadācittatastyo rājā grīṣmakālaprabhāvādabhilaṣaṇīyatarāṃ salilakrīḍāṃ prati samutsukamatirudyānaguṇātiśayaniketabhūtaṃ taṃ vanapradeśaṃ sāntaḥpuraḥ samabhijagāma |
S03n251:26: madapragalbhānyapi kokilānāṃ rutāni nṛtyāni ca barhiṇānām |
S03n251:29: natā iva svena kalaguṇena cakrurmayūrāḥ kṣitipasya sevām ||11 ||
S03n251:30: sa tatra sāntaḥpura udyānavanavihārasukhaṃ prakāmamanubhūya krīḍāprasaṅgaparikhedānmadapariṣvaṅgācca śrīmati vimānapradeśe mahārhaśayanīyavaragato nidrāvaśamupajagāma |
S03n251:31: atha tā yoṣitaḥ prastāvāntaragatamavetya rājānaṃ vanaśobhābhirākṣipyamāṇahṛdayāstaddarśanāvitṛptā yathāprītikṛtasamavāyāḥ samākulabhūṣaṇatinādasaṃmiśrakalapralāpāḥ samantataḥ prasasruḥ |
S03n251:34: tāḥ prāpya rūpāṇi mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpāṇi cārūṇi ca pallavāni |
S03n251:38: atha tā vanaramaṇīyatayākṣipyamāṇahṛdayā rājayoṣitastadvanamanuvicarantyaḥ kṣāntivādina āśramapadamupajagmuḥ |
S03n251:39: viditatapaḥprabhāvamāhātmyāstu tasya muneḥ strījanādhikṛtā rājño vāllabhyād durāsadatvācca tāsāṃ naināstato vārayituṃ prasehire |
S03n251:40: abhisaṃskāraramaṇīyatarayā cāśramapadaśriyā samākṛṣyamāṇā iva tā yoṣitaḥ praviśyāśramapadaṃ dadṛśustatra taṃ munivaraṃ praśamasaumyadarśanamatigāmbhīryātiśayād durāsadamabhijvalantamiva tapaḥśriyā dhyānābhiyogādudāraviṣayasaṃnikarṣe'pyakṣubhitendriyanaibhṛtyaśobhaṃ sākṣāddharmamiva maṅgalyaṃ puṇyadarśanaṃ vṛkṣamūle baddhāsanamāsīnam |
S03n251:41: atha tā rājastriyastasya tapastejasākrāntasattvāḥ saṃdarśanādeva tyaktavibhramavilāsauddhatyā vinayanibhṛtamabhigamyainaṃ paryupāsāṃcakrire |
S03n251:42: sa tāsāṃ svāgatādipriyavacanapuraḥsaramatithijanamanoharamupacāravidhiṃ pravartya tatparipraśnopapāditaprastāvābhiḥ strījanasukhagrahaṇārthābhirdṛṣṭāntavatībhiḥ kathābhirdharmātithyamāsāṃ cakāra |
S03n251:44: avaśyamṛtyurna karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ pramādabhākpratyahameṣa vañcyate ||15 ||
S03n251:45: kulena rūpeṇa vayoguṇena vā balaprakarṣeṇa dhanodayena vā |
S03n251:49: kulasya rūpasya vayoguṇasya vā balaprakarṣasya dhanocchrayasya vā |
S03n251:54: janasya ceyaṃ na khalu svabhāvataḥ parāśrayādvā trividhā tu karmaṇaḥ ||20 ||
S03n251:55: avetya caivaṃ niyatāṃ jagatsthitiṃ calaṃ vināśapravaṇaṃ ca jīvitam |
S03n251:56: jahīta pāpāni śubhakramāśayādayaṃ hi panthā yaśase sukhāya ca ||21 ||
S03n251:58: ataḥ prayatnena sa pāpabhīruṇā janena varjyaḥ pratipakṣaśaṃśrayāt ||22 ||
S03n251:66: śubhasvabhāvātiśayaḥ prasiddhaḥ puṇyena kīrtyā ca parā vivṛddhiḥ |
S03n251:74: hantīti yā dharmavipakṣamāyāṃ prāhuḥ sukhaṃ civa vimokṣamāyām |
S03n251:76: iti sa mahātmā tāsāṃ dharmātithyaṃ cakāra |
S03n251:77: atha sa rājā nidrāklamavinodanātprativibuddhaḥ sāvaśeṣamadagurunayano madanānuvṛttyā kutra devya iti śayanapālikāḥ sabhrūkṣepaṃ paryapṛcchat |
S03n251:78: etā deva vanāntarāṇyupaśobhayamānāstadvibhūtiṃ paśyantīti copalabhya śayanapālikābhyaḥ sa rājā devījanasya visrambhaniryantraṇahasitakathitadravaviceṣṭitadarśanotsukamatirutthāya śayanādyuvatidhṛtacchatravyajanottarīyakhaṅgaḥ sakañcukairvetradaṇḍapāṇibhirantapurāvacaraiḥ kṛtānuyātrastadvanamanuvicacāra |
S03n251:80: dṛṣṭaiva tu sa rājā kṣāntivādinaṃ tamṛṣivaraṃ devijanaparivṛtaṃ pūrvavairānuśayadoṣānmadaparibhramitasmṛtitvādīrṣyāparābhūtamatitvācca paraṃ kopamupajagāma |
S03n251:81: pratisaṃkhyānabalavaikalyācca bhraṣṭavinayopacārasauṣṭhavaḥ saṃrambhapāpmābhibhavādāpatitasvedavaivarṇyavepathurbhrūbhaṅgajihmavivṛttasthirābhitāmranayano viraktakāntilāvaṇyaśobhaḥ pracalatkanakavalayau parimṛdnan sāṅgalivibhūṣaṇau pāṇī tamṛṣivaramadhikṣipaṃstattaduvāca | haṃho-
S03n251:84: tacchrutvā varṣavarāḥ sasaṃbhramāvegā rājanamūcuḥ-deva mā maivam |
S03n251:86: upahatādhyāśayatvāttu sa rājā tatteṣāṃ vacanamapratigṛhṇannuvāca-kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ !
S03n251:89: tadayamasya tāpasanepathyāvacchāditaṃ māyaśāṭhyasaṃbhṛtaṃ kuhakasvabhāvaṃ prakāṣayāmītyuktvā pratihārīhastādasimādāya hantumutpatitaniścayastamṛṣivaraṃ sapatnavacabhijagāma |
S03n251:90: atha tā devyaḥ parijananiveditābhyagamanamālokya rājānaṃ krodhasaṃkṣiptasaumyabhāvaṃ vitānībhūtahṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramāvegacañcalanayanāḥ samutthāyābhivādya ca tamṛṣivaraṃ samudyatāñjalikuḍmalāḥ śarannalinya iva samudgataikapaṅkajānanamukulā rājānamabhijagmuḥ |
S03n251:93: labdhataraprāṇaprasarāstu tā devyaḥ sasaṃrambhavikārasamudācārarūkṣakramaṃ sāyudhamabhipatantaṃ tamudīkṣya rājānaṃ tamṛṣivaraṃ prati vivartitābhinivisṭadṛṣṭiṃ samāvṛṇvatya ūcuḥ-deva mā mā khalu sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ |
S03n251:95: praduṣṭabhāvāttu sa rājā samāvarjitabhāvā nūnamanenemā iti suṣṭhutaraṃ kopamupetya sphuṭaraṃ bhrūbhaṅgairasūyāsamāveśatīkṣṇaistiryagavekṣitaistattāsāṃ praṇayaprāgalbhyamavabhartsya saroṣamavekṣamāṇaḥ strījanādhikṛtāñchiraḥkampādākampamānakuṇḍalamukuṭaviṭapastā yoṣito'bhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca-
S03n251:100: atha tā devyastasmin rājani krodhasaṃrambhakarkaśahṛdaye pratyāhatapraṇayāḥ prajānānāśca tasya rājñaścaṇḍatāṃ duranuneyatāṃ ca vaimanasyadainyākrāntamanasaḥ strījanādhikṛtairbhayaviṣādavyākulitairhastasaṃjñābhirapasāryamāṇā vrīḍāvanatavadanāstamṛṣivaryaṃ samanuśocantyastato'pacakramuḥ |
S03n251:105: kṣitīśavṛttiṃ pratilabdhakīrtiṃ tanuṃ munerasya tapastanuṃ ca |
S03n251:106: amūnyanāgāṃsi ca no manāṃsi tulyaṃ hi hanyādapi nāma rājā ||36 ||
S03n251:107: iti tāsu devīṣvanuśocitaviniḥśvasitamātraparāyaṇāsvapayātāsu sa rājā tamṛṣīvaraṃ saṃtarjayan roṣavaśanniṣkṛṣya khaṅgaṃ svayameva cchettumupacakrame |
S03n251:111: atha bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntiparicayādavicalitadhṛtistenāsatkāraprayogeṇa taṃ rājānaṃ roṣasaṃrambhavirūpaceṣṭitaṃ bhraṣṭavinayopacāraśriyaṃ vismṛtātmahitāhitapathamāgatavismayaḥ kṣaṇamabhivīkṣya karūṇāyamānaḥ samuneṣyanniyatamīdṛśaṃ kiṃciduvāca-
S03n251:113: saṃdṛśyate jagati tena na me'tra cintā |
S03n251:115: rvācāpi na tvayi mayā kriyate yathārham ||38 ||
S03n251:118: na yuktarūpaṃ sahasā pravartituṃ vimarśamārgo'pyanugamyatāṃ yataḥ ||39 ||
S03n251:120: na kāryatattvaṃ sahasaiva lakṣyate vimarśamaprāpya viśeṣahetubhiḥ ||40 ||
S03n251:121: vimṛśya kāryaṃ tvavagamya tattvataḥ prapadya dharmeṇa ca nītivartmanā |
S03n251:122: mahānti dharmārthasukhāni sādhayajanasya taireva na hīyate nṛpaḥ ||41 ||
S03n251:125: tapovane tvadbhujavīryarakṣite pareṇa yannāma kṛtaṃ na marṣayeḥ |
S03n251:126: hitakramonmāthi yadāryagarhitaṃ svayaṃ mahīnātha kathaṃ vyavasyasi ||43 ||
S03n251:127: striyo'bhiyātā yadi te mamāśramaṃ yadṛcchayāntaḥpuraraikṣibhiḥ saha |
S03n251:128: vyatikramastatra ca no bhavetkiyān ruṣāyadevaṃ gamito'si vikriyām ||44 ||
S03n251:129: athāpyayaṃ syādaparādha eva me kṣamā tu śobheta tathāpi te nṛpa |
S03n251:130: kṣamā hi śaktasya paraṃ vibhūṣaṇaṃ guṇānurakṣānipūnatvasūcanāt ||45 ||
S03n251:140: bodhisattva uvāca-śrūyatāṃ mahārāja yadartho'yaṃ mama prayatnaḥ |
S03n251:142: iti te matkṛte mā bhūdyaśo vācyavijarjaram ||49 ||
S03n251:144: iti me na bhayaṃ tasmātsvaṃ vṛttaṃ canupaśyataḥ ||50 ||
S03n251:145: sukhodarkasya dharmasya pīḍā mā bhuttathaiva tu |
S03n251:149: atha sa rājā sūnṛtānyapi tānyanādṛtya tasya munervacanakusumāni sāsūyaṃ tamṛṣivaramuvāca-drakṣyāma idānīṃ te kṣāntyanurāgamityuktvā nivāraṇārthamiṣadabhiprasāritamabhyucchritapratanudīrghāṅgaliṃ tasya munerdakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ niśitenāsinā kamalamiva nāladeśād vyayojayat |
S03n251:154: atha bodhisattvaḥ kaṣṭamatikrānto'yaṃ svahitamaryādāmapātrībhūto'nunayasyeti vaidya pratyākhyātamānuramivainaṃ samanuśocaṃstūṣṇīṃbabhūva |
S03n251:158: bodhisattvastvanunayākṣamamenaṃ viditvāyaṃ ca nāmāsya nirbandha iti nainaṃ kiṃciduvāca |
S03n251:159: atha sa rājā tasya mahātmano dvitīyaṃ pāṇibhūmau bāhu karṇanāsaṃ caraṇau tathaiva nicakarta |
S03n251:160: patati tu niśite'pyasau śarīre na munivaraḥ sa śuśoca no cukopa |
S03n251:163: nāsīd duḥkhaṃ prītiyogānnṛpaṃ tu bhraṣṭaṃ dharmādvikṣya saṃtāpamāpa ||56 ||
S03n251:166: ghoraṃ tu tatkarmaḥ nṛpaḥ sa kṛtvā sadyo jvareṇānugato'gnineva |
S03n251:168: nimagne tu tasmin rājani bhīmaśabdamavadīrṇāyāṃ vahnijvālākulāyāṃ samudbhūte mahati kolāhale samantataḥ prakṣubhite vyākule rājakule tasya rājño'mātyā jānānāstasya munestapaḥprabhāvamāhātmyaṃ tatkṛtaṃ ca rājño dharaṇītalanimajjanaṃ manyamānāḥ purāyamṛṣivarastasya rājño doṣātsarvamidaṃ janapadaṃ nirdahatīti jātabhayāśaṅkāḥ samabhigamya tamṛṣivaramabhipraṇamya kṣamayamāṇāḥ kṛtāñjalayo vijñāpayāmāsuḥ-
S03n251:170: śāpānalasyendhanatāṃ sa eva prayātu te mā puramasya kṣākṣīḥ ||59 ||
S03n251:172: tatsādhu deśaṃ kṣitipasya tasya svaṃ caiva dharmaṃ guṇapakṣa rakṣa ||60 ||
S03n251:175: chinnavān yo'pi tāvanme vane nivasata sataḥ ||61 ||
S03n251:177: ciraṃ jīvatvasau rājā mā cainaṃ pāpamāgamat ||62 ||
S03n251:179: dagdhe duścaritaiḥ śocye kaḥ kopaṃ kartumarhati ||63 ||
S03n251:180: syāllabhyarūpastu yadi kramo'yaṃ mayyeva pacyeta tadasya pāpam |
S03n251:182: trātuṃ na śakyastu mayā yadevaṃ vinirdahannātmahitaṃ sa rājā |
S03n251:184: ṛte'pi rājño maraṇādiduḥkhaṃ jātena sarveṇa niṣevitavyam |
S03n251:185: janmaiva tenātra na marṣaṇīyaṃ tannāsti cetkiṃ ca kutaśca duḥkham ||66 ||
S03n251:187: jahyāṃ kathaṃ tatpralaye titikṣāṃ tṛṇasya hetoriva ratnajāṭam ||67 ||
S03n251:189: kimakṣamāyāṃ praṇayaṃ kariṣye tadbhaiṣṭa mā svasti ca vo'stu yāt ||68 ||
S03n251:190: iti sa munivaro'nuśiṣya tān samamupanīya ca sādhuśiṣyatām |
S03n251:192: tadevaṃ sātmībhūtakṣamāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānamahatāṃ nāviṣahyaṃ nāmāstīti kṣāntiguṇasaṃvarṇane munimupanīya vācyam |
S03n251:193: cāpalākṣāntidoṣanidarśane rājānamupanīya kāmādinavakathāyāmapi vācyam-evaṃ kāmahetorduścaritamāsevya vinipātabhāgino bhavantīti |
